feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: Bodigrim/data-array-byte
entry.summary:
Compatibility layer for Data.Array.Byte from base

data-array-byte

Compatibility layer for Data.Array.Byte, providing boxed wrappers for ByteArray# and MutableByteArray# and relevant instances for GHC < 9.4. Include it into your Cabal file:

build-depends: base
if impl(ghc < 9.4)
  build-depends: data-array-byte

and then import Data.Array.Byte unconditionally.
